meanings.definition: A record of the pedigree of purebred animals, especially horses.
meanings.sent1: The studbooks showed the lineage of the champion racehorse.
meanings.sent2: Breeders consult the studbooks to trace the ancestry of their horses.
meanings.sent3: The studbooks revealed that the famous horse was actually related to a donkey!
meanings.sent4: In the world of horse breeding, studbooks are like ancient scrolls revealing noble bloodlines.
meanings.sent5: The worn pages of the studbooks whispered the secrets of generations past.

meanings.definition: A book containing a list of registered stallions and their offspring.
meanings.sent1: The studbooks listed the strong stallions and their promising foals.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on studbooks to choose the best sires for their mares.
meanings.sent3: The studbooks accidentally included a pony in the list of stallions!
meanings.sent4: Within the studbooks, the stallions' names stood out like bold chapter titles.
meanings.sent5: The studbooks painted a vivid picture of the stallions' lineage through the ages.

meanings.definition: A register of breeding animals maintained by a breed association.
meanings.sent1: The studbooks of the association kept track of all the breeding pairs.
meanings.sent2: Members of the breed association regularly update the studbooks with new entries.
meanings.sent3: The studbooks of the association were so detailed, they even included the pets of the breeders!
meanings.sent4: To breeders, the studbooks were like a treasure map leading to the best genetic combinations.
meanings.sent5: The studbooks gleamed with the collective history and future hopes of the breeders.
